XI.iii.1.B.1.f
.
Eligible Veterans' Loyalty Clearance
If a loyalty clearance is required for making a burial benefit decision, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 3.B.6
.
In the absence of a decision concerning the Veteran's loyalty or forfeiture of benefits, the Veteran’s loyalty clearance will
not
be required.
Reference
:  For more information on an eligible Veteran’s loyalty clearance, see
38 CFR 3.902
, and
38 CFR 3.903
.
